**Topic:** For instance, the rise of AI-powered customer service chatbots has led to a decrease in human customer support jobs.

### Supporting Point 1

Companies such as Amazon and IBM have implemented automation systems to handle customer inquiries, resulting in significant job losses (Kumar et al., 2020). **Topic:** Moreover, the changing nature of work will also impact family structures and relationships.

### Supporting Point 1
Moreover, the changing nature of work will also impact family structures and relationships. With more emphasis on remote work and flexible schedules, traditional notions of work-life balance may become increasingly obsolete. A survey by Gallup found that 43% of employees reported working remotely at least some of the time, leading to increased flexibility but also blurred boundaries between work and personal life (Gallup, 2020).

A study by the American Psychological Association found that 44% of employees reported feeling stressed or anxious at work due to automation-related pressures (APA, 2020).
